courseDetails.title: eBay Dropshipping Uzmanlığı ChatGPT ile: Karlı Bir İş Kurma
courseDetails.shortDescription: Adım Adım Rehber: ChatGPT ile Karlı bir eBay Dropshipping İşletmesi Kurma
courseDetails.longDescription:
Finansal Kaderinizi Ele Almaya ve Kendi Başarılı eBay İşinizin Patronu Olmaya Hazır mısınız? Daha fazla aramayın! Okyanusi Üniversitesi ile işbirliği içinde sunduğumuz kapsamlı eBay Dropshipping Eğitimimiz, size çevrimiçi pazarda hakimiyet kurmak için gerekli beceri ve stratejileri kazandırmak için burada.

Giriş

eBay, insanların çevrimiçi olarak ürün satın alıp satmasının yolunu devrim niteliğinde değiştirmiştir ve dropshipping giderek popüler bir iş modeli olarak ortaya çıkmıştır. eBay Dropshipping Eğitimimiz ile kendi evinizin rahatlığında eBay'ın gücünden yararlanabilir, a excessive startup costs yükünden kurtulabilirsiniz.

eBay Dropshipping'in Faydaları

Dropshipping, girişimci adayları için birçok avantaj sunar. eBay'ın geniş müşteri tabanını kullanarak, fiziksel envanter ihtiyacı olmadan küresel bir kitleye ulaşabilirsiniz. Doğru stratejilerle, risk ve masrafları en aza indirirken kâr potansiyelinizi en üst düzeye çıkarabilirsiniz.

Kapsamlı eBay Dropshipping Eğitim Kampı

Okyanusi Üniversitesi ile işbirliği içinde geliştirdiğimiz eBay Dropshipping Eğitimimiz, eBay dropshipping'in rekabetçi dünyasında başarılı olmanıza yardımcı olmak üzere tasarlanmış kapsamlı bir müfredat sunar. Bu kurs, deneyimli girişimciler ve acemiler için uygundur ve karlı bir eBay işletmesi başlatmak ve büyütmek için kanıtlanmış adımları size rehberlik eder.

Liste Optimizasyonu İçin SEO Tekniklerini Ustalaştırma

Kalabalık eBay pazarında öne çıkmak için listelerinizi en yüksek görünürlük ve karlılık için optimize etmek çok önemlidir. Kurslarımız size en yeni SEO teknik ve stratejilerini öğreterek eBay listeleme sıralamalarınızı iyileştirmenize ve daha fazla potansiyel alıcı çekmenize yardımcı olur.

eBay'in Ücret Yapısını Anlayarak Kar Marjlarını Maksimize Etme

eBay'in ücret yapısını anlamak, kâr marjlarınızı maksimize etmek için esastır. eBay'de satış yaparken dahil olan çeşitli ücretleri derinlemesine inceleyecek ve maliyetleri minimize edip kârınızı artırmak için size içgörüler ve stratejiler sağlayacağız.

Güvenilir Bir Satıcı Olma ve En İyi Dereceli Statüsüne Ulaşma

eBay'de güvenilir bir satıcı olmak ve en iyi dereceli statüsüne ulaşmak, satışlarınızı ve itibarınızı önemli ölçüde artırabilir. Size güvenilir bir satıcı olmanın sırlarını, alıcı güvenini oluşturmanın ve platformdaki başarınızı artırmak için mükemmel müşteri hizmetleri sunmanın yollarını açıklayacağız.

Maksimum Satış İçin Etkileyici eBay Listeleri Oluşturma

Etkileyici eBay listeleri oluşturmak, satışlarınız üzerinde önemli bir etki yapabilecek bir sanattır. Kurslarımız size adım adım, etkileyici ürün açıklamaları oluşturma, başlıkları ve anahtar kelimeleri optimize etme ve alıcıları çekmek ve tutarlı satışlar gerçekleştirmek için yüksek kaliteli görseller kullanma sürecinde rehberlik eder.

Mükemmel Ürün Nişi Seçme ve Dropshipping Ortaklıklarını Kullanma

eBay dropshipping'de başarılı olmak için doğru ürün nişini seçmek kritik bir öneme sahiptir. Size kârlı ürün nişlerini belirlemenize, pazar araştırması yapmanıza ve işlemlerinizi düzene sokmak ve satışlarınızı artırmak için dropshipping ortaklıklarının potansiyelini keşfetmenize yardımcı olacağız.

Ortaya Çıkan Pazar Trendlerinden Yararlanma

Ortaya çıkan pazar trendleriyle güncel kalmak, rekabette önde olmak için esastır. Size pazar trendlerini nasıl belirleyeceğinizi ve fırsatları nasıl değerlendireceğinizi, yeni ürün fırsatlarını keşfetmenizi ve eBay alıcılarının değişen taleplerine uyum sağlamak için stratejilerinizi nasıl adapte edeceğinizi öğreteceğiz.

Uzun Vadeli Başarı ve Evrilen Stratejiler

eBay Dropshipping Eğitim Kampımız, size uzun vadeli başarı için bilgi ve beceriler sunmak üzere tasarlanmıştır. On yılı aşkın eBay uzmanlığı ile kurslarımız, çevrimiçi ticaretin sürekli değişen manzarasında uyum sağlamak ve gelişmek için en son stratejileri ve en iyi uygulamaları ile donatmanıza yardımcı olacaktır.

Kurs Gereksinimleri

eBay Dropshipping Eğitimimizi almak için gereksinimler:

  • Daha önce eBay deneyimi veya bilgisi gerekmemektedir.

  • Potansiyel satıcılar ve dropshipping ortaklarıyla iletişime geçme isteği.

  • eBay'da nasıl satış yapılacağına dair temel bir anlayış.

  • İnternet erişimi olan bir bilgisayar veya cihaz.

  • Alternatif, ancak son derece etkili stratejileri benimsemeye açık bir zihniyet.

Bu Kursu Kimler Almalı

Okyanusi Üniversitesi ile eBay Dropshipping Eğitim Kampımız, eBay'in platformunun gücünü kullanmak ve dropshipping dünyasına girmek isteyen bireyler için tasarlanmıştır. Bu kurs, şunlar için uygundur:

  • Girişimci Adayları: Kendi çevrimiçi işinizi başlatmanın hayalini kuruyorsanız ve eBay'in erişim ve potansiyelinden yararlanmak istiyorsanız, bu kurs tam size göre. Girişimcilik yolculuğunuza başlamak için gerekli bilgi ve becerileri sağlayacağız.

  • Dropshipping'e İlgisi Olan Bireyler: Dropshipping, çevrimiçi bir iş başlatmanın düşük riskli ve maliyet etkin bir yolunu sunar. Dropshipping'e yeni başlıyorsanız veya biraz deneyiminiz varsa, size güvenilir tedarikçiler bulma, envanter yönetimi ve siparişleri sorunsuz bir şekilde yerine getirme sürecinden rehberlik edecek bu kurs sizin için idealdir.

  • Esneklik ve Konfor Arayanlar: Evden veya internet bağlantısı olan herhangi bir yerden çalışma özgürlüğünü değerli buluyorsanız, eBay dropshipping size istediğiniz esnekliği ve konforu sağlayabilir. Kurslarımız size esnek bir yaşam tarzının avantajlarını yaşarken sürdürülebilir bir eBay işi nasıl kurulacağını öğretecektir.

  • Ek Gelir Elde Etmek İsteyenler: Mevcut gelirinizi desteklemek veya yeni bir gelir akışı yaratmak istiyorsanız, eBay dropshipping kârlı bir girişim olabilir. Size kazançlarınızı artırmak ve eBay işinizden en iyi şekilde yararlanmak için kanıtlanmış taktikler ve stratejiler paylaşacağız.

eBay'da Tam Potansiyelinizi Ortaya Çıkarın, Satış Sanatında Uzmanlaşın ve Finansal Başarıya Giden Yolunuzu Açın! Şimdi harekete geçin ve Okyanusi Üniversitesi ile eBay Dropshipping Eğitim Kampımıza kaydolun.

SSS

eBay dropshipping’i yarı zamanlı bir iş olarak yapabilir miyim?

Kesinlikle! eBay dropshipping, kendi programınıza göre çalışma esnekliği sunar. Yarı zamanlı bir satıcı olarak başlayabilir ve mevcudiyetiniz ve hedefleriniz doğrultusunda işinizi ölçeklendirebilirsiniz.

eBay dropshipping'de başarılı olmak için teknik becerilere ihtiyaç duyar mıyım?

Hayır, eBay dropshipping'de başarılı olmak için ileri düzeyde teknik becerilere ihtiyaç duymazsınız.

Kurslarımız sizi sürecin her adımında yönlendirecek, hatta bir başlangıç seviyesindeyseniz bile sizi destekleyecektir.

Kurs ne kadar sürer ve ne kadar zaman ayırmalıyım?

Bu kurs, kendi hızınızda ilerlemenize olanak sağlayan esnek bir yapıya sahiptir. Genellikle, öğrencilerimiz kursu 8-12 hafta içinde tamamlamaktadır. Başarıya ulaşmak için haftada en az 5-7 saat ayırmanızı öneririz, ancak bu tamamen sizin hızınıza ve programınıza bağlıdır.


Sonuç

eBay'in gücünü kilidini açın ve eBay satış patronu olarak kazançlı bir yolculuğa çıkın. Okyanusi Üniversitesi ile kapsamlı eBay Dropshipping Eğitim Kampımız, eBay dropshipping'in rekabetçi dünyasında gelişmeniz için gereken bilgi, stratejiler ve becerileri size sunar. İster bir başlangıç seviyesinde olun, ister deneyimli bir girişimci, bu kurs sizi başarılı bir eBay işi başlatmak ve büyütmek için gereken araçlarla donatacaktır. Finansal geleceğinizi dönüştürme fırsatını kaçırmayın. Şimdi kaydolun ve bir eBay satış patronu olma yolunda ilk adımınızı atın!
targetAudiences: Kendi işlerini kurmak ve e-ticaret ve dropshipping sektörüne ilgi duyan bireyler, bu kursta büyük bir değer bulacaktır.
eBay Satıcıları: eBay'de zaten bir varlığı olan ancak iş modelini dropshipping'i de içerecek şekilde genişletmek isteyenler, kurs içeriğinden büyük fayda görecektir.
E-ticaret Tutkunları: Aktif bir işleri olmasa bile e-ticaret konusunda ilgisi olan herkes, eBay'deki dropshipping modeli hakkında kapsamlı bir anlayış kazanacaktır.
Kariyer Değiştirenler: Çevrimiçi bir iş alanına kariyer değişikliği yapmayı arayan kişiler, içeriği son derece uygulanabilir ve pratik bulacaktır.
Dijital Göçebeler: Esnek ve konumdan bağımsız bir iş isteyenler, eBay'de dropshipping modelini uygun bulacaktır.

Do you want to start your first link-building campaign? Are you interested in increasing your online sales but afraid of going over budget? Do you want to reach new customers and increase sales?

This is an in-depth course to get started with link building.

In this link building course, we will walk through all the steps of launching effective links.

In this practical class, you will get a complete understanding of how to efficiently work with link building tactics and create successful campaigns to get loyal customers, increase traffic, and grow your business online.

Link building is an effective strategy to promote a website by placing backlinks on third-party resources. The goal of link building is to make your pages more "reliable and valid" in Google's eyes so that they rank higher and get more search traffic.

If you are not engaged in links, it does not mean that your site has none. Perhaps you have marketing services, such as content marketing or PR services, so the site will have links one way or another. If you're not in control of this process, one day it could cause trouble for you because you could get ranked in search, get penalized by Google for bad links, and not even know what's causing it. So, it's still important to understand how it works.

This course will teach you:

  • How link building works, its pros, and cons

courseDetails.title: Introduction to Bar Graphs
courseDetails.shortDescription: Bar Graphs, Bar Charts
courseDetails.longDescription:

2. If the data on the number of girls per thousand boys in different sections of the society is given, then how to represent the information given by way of a bar graph and what conclusions can be arrived at from the graph.

3. If the data in respect of seats won by different political parties in polling outcome of state assembly elections is given, then how to draw the bar graph to represent the polling results.

4. Why Bar graph or Bar Chart is used?

5. Whether bars in the bar graph are drawn vertically or horizontally?

6. Whether any space is left between bars?

7. Whether each bar in the bar graph has an equal width?

courseDetails.title: Complete Beginners Trading Strategy For Passive Income
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn to Swing Trade, a Successful Forex and Stock Trading Style Followed by a Technical Analysis-Based Trading Strategy
courseDetails.longDescription:
Swing trading is a kind of trading in which gains are sought over a few days to several weeks in a stock (or any other financial asset). Technical analysis is the main tool used by swing traders to find trading opportunities.


  • Swing trading is the practise of entering positions that can last from a few days to many months in an effort to capitalise on an expected price movement.

  • A trader who engages in swing trading is exposed to overnight and weekend risk, where the price may gap and start the next session at a significantly different price.

  • The only methodology used in this swing trading course is a very potent Price Action methodology, along with the required position management strategies.

Swing trading usually includes maintaining a long or short position for more than one trading session, although typically not for more than a few weeks or a few months. This is just a basic time range; even though some deals may extend for several months or more, the trader may still classify them as swing trades. Swing trades can also happen during a trading session, but this is an uncommon result caused by incredibly volatile circumstances.


THIS COURSE IS INTENDED FOR THOSE INDIVIDUALS WHO ARE PREPARED TO FINISH IT, AND, IMPLEMENT WHAT THEY HAVE LEARNED

REGARDS,
targetAudiences: This course is exclusively for newbies who want to learn swing trading.

I’ve been lucky enough to build two successful podcasts in my life. Investing in Cannabis is the leading podcast in the exploding legal industry. courseDetails.title: Ultimate Terraform Guide with Interview Preparation
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn all the needed skills and Land your Job Guarantee
courseDetails.longDescription:
DevOps is a combination of software development and information technology operations that enables businesses to deliver applications at a faster pace. It brings together development and operations teams so there are fewer redundancies in the software development process.

DevSecOps is a culture shift in the software industry that aims to bake security into the rapid-release cycles that are typical of modern application development and deployment.


DevOps has revolutionized workplaces in many ways. The number of DevOps-related jobs are increasing, while its rank as an in-demand job.


DevOps is important because it's a software development and operations approach that enables faster development of new products and easier maintenance of existing deployments.


What is Infrastructure as Code (IAC) ?
Infrastructure as Code (IaC) is the managing and provisioning of infrastructure through code instead of through manual processes.

With IaC, configuration files are created that contain your infrastructure specifications, which makes it easier to edit and distribute configurations. It also ensures that you provision the same environment every time.


What is Terraform ?

Terraform is an open-source infrastructure as code software tool created by HashiCorp. Users define and provide data center infrastructure using a declarative configuration language known as HashiCorp Configuration Language, or optionally JSON.
targetAudiences: DevOps Engineers
DevSecOps Engineers
Developers
System Administrator
IT Engineers

courseDetails.title: AZ-104 - Microsoft Azure Hands On Labs
courseDetails.shortDescription: Cloud Computing with Microsoft Azure
courseDetails.longDescription:
About Me


  • My journey began in 2020, after successfully passing my AWS Solutions Architect Exam. This achievement inspired me to pursue the next level in my AWS certification journey, which was becoming an AWS SysOps Administrator.


  • Upon successfully obtaining my AWS SysOps Administrator certification, I decided to expand my skills and knowledge by exploring the cloud computing platform Azure, created by Microsoft. As I delved deeper into this field, I was inspired to share my experiences and expertise with others who were also starting their own cloud computing journey.


  • To achieve this, I decided to create a YouTube channel where I could share my knowledge and insights with fellow students. My goal was to provide helpful resources and guidance to those who were also interested in pursuing a career in cloud computing.


  • Additionally, I have plans to organize courses and lectures that will assist other Azure enthusiasts in their cloud computing journey. Through these educational initiatives, I hope to provide valuable learning opportunities for individuals looking to expand their knowledge and skills in cloud computing, particularly within the Azure platform.

About This Course


  • This course is specifically designed for beginners who are just starting their journey in cloud computing and are interested in learning more about Microsoft Azure. Whether you have limited experience with cloud computing or are entirely new to the field, this course will provide you with a solid foundation to build upon. Through this course, you will gain a comprehensive understanding of the essential concepts and practices in cloud computing using the Azure platform.

  • During the course, we will devote our time to exploring the Microsoft Azure portal, where we will learn how to deploy resources and perform various Azure administration tasks. Through hands-on practice, we will gain practical experience in using the Azure platform and learn how to manage and maintain various Azure resources effectively. By the end of the course, you will have the skills and knowledge necessary to navigate the Azure portal with confidence and successfully carry out essential cloud computing tasks. 

  • The best way to learn and retain knowledge is through active practice, which is why this course will prioritize hands-on learning experiences through labs and exercises. Throughout the course, we will cover various topics that are relevant to the Azure AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator Exam. By participating in lab exercises and practical assignments, you will have the opportunity to apply the concepts and principles that you learn in a real-world setting.


  • Through this hands-on approach, you will gain valuable experience in managing and administering Azure resources, and be better equipped to succeed in the Azure certification exam. By the end of the course, you will have acquired practical skills and knowledge that are highly relevant to the field of cloud computing, and be able to confidently navigate the Azure platform.


  • As an instructor, I am committed to providing the most up-to-date and relevant course content possible. Throughout the course, I will guide all my students through the many features and resources of Microsoft Azure, and make every effort to simplify complex concepts so that everyone can follow along with ease. To ensure that you gain a comprehensive understanding of the Azure platform, we will focus heavily on hands-on learning experiences through lab exercises and assignments. By practicing as many labs as possible, you will have the opportunity to build on your cloud computing skills and develop practical expertise in managing and administering Azure resources. I am dedicated to helping you succeed in your cloud computing journey, and I will do everything I can to ensure that you acquire the skills and knowledge necessary to confidently navigate the Azure platform.


  • In the near future, I plan to delve deeper into the advanced features and capabilities of Microsoft Azure. As you progress through your cloud computing journey, it is essential to explore the more complex functionalities of Azure to gain a deeper understanding of the platform's full potential. Through advanced courses and lectures, we will cover topics such as advanced networking and security etc. By exploring these topics in greater detail, you will be better equipped to tackle more challenging projects and excel in your cloud computing career. I am excited to continue to support you in your cloud computing journey, and I look forward to providing you with the knowledge and skills necessary to become an expert in Microsoft Azure.


Ultimately, my objective is to assist a maximum number of students possible, so that we can learn collectively and progress together.


I hope that you will come along with me on this journey.


I extend my best wishes to you, so let’s get started!!!

In case of any questions, or for certificate getting you may write us to email welcome  gtf . pt ot find the contacts at our web site gtf . pt


Assessment Description:

A User Experience Design assessment is a crucial tool for evaluating the knowledge and skills of individuals in this field. It consists of a series of questions that assess a person’s understanding of various aspects of UX design, including user research, information architecture, usability testing, prototyping, and visual design. The assessment helps to determine a person’s level of expertise in UX design and identify areas where they may need further development.


For employees, taking a User Experience Design assessment can be a valuable way to assess their skills and knowledge in this field. It can help them to identify areas where they may need further development, as well as areas where they excel. By taking the assessment, employees can gain a better understanding of their strengths and weaknesses in UX design and work to improve their skills where necessary.


For companies, conducting User Experience Design assessments for their employees can be an effective way to evaluate their workforce’s skills and knowledge in this field. It helps companies to identify areas where their employees may need further training or development and make decisions about how to allocate resources to improve their team’s overall expertise in UX design. By investing in their employees’ skills and knowledge in UX design, companies can improve the quality of their products and services, leading to better customer satisfaction and increased profits.


User Experience Design is a valuable and in-demand skill set in today’s job market. Companies across industries are recognizing the importance of UX design in creating successful products and services that meet the needs of their users. As a result, there is a growing need for individuals with expertise in UX design.


Building a career in UX design begins with a solid understanding of the foundational principles and skills in this field. A User Experience Design assessment can help individuals to evaluate their skills and knowledge and identify areas where they need further development. By continually developing their skills in UX design, individuals can become more valuable to employers and increase their opportunities for career advancement.


In addition to technical skills, successful UX designers must also possess strong communication and collaboration skills. They must be able to work effectively with cross-functional teams, including product managers, engineers, and stakeholders, to ensure that the design meets the needs of all stakeholders. They must also be able to communicate their design decisions effectively, both verbally and visually, to stakeholders who may not have a background in UX design.


User Experience Design assessment is a valuable tool for both employees and companies. It cans help individuals to evaluate their skills and knowledge in this field and identify areas where they need further development, as well as help companies to evaluate their workforce’s skills and knowledge in UX design and make decisions about how to allocate resources to improve their team’s expertise in this field. By investing in their skills and knowledge in UX design, individuals can build successful careers in this growing field, while companies can create successful products and services that meet the needs of their users.

Hey everyone!

My name is Shubham Jha and welcome to Photoshop Selection and Masking Master Course 2022. This course is planned around reasonable, achievable goals for my students, which helps to increase the effective rate of learning. I understand that every individual learns at a different pace. Hence, I've ensured that you are well catered for so that you understand every aspect of your chosen modules. In this course you'll not only learn how to use Selection tools and techniques but you'll also learn when and why to use them. I assure you that by the end of this course you will be able to select anything from objects in highly pixelated low-resolution images to dreaded hairs, so what you are waiting for, get started today!

What you will learn?

Here is a complete list of everything you’ll learn in this Photoshop course.

Section 1: Introduction

  • Here I'll give you a brief introduction about what tools and techniques we are going to learn in this course.

  • I'll tell you how you can earn thousands of dollars by just selecting objects and removing background in Photoshop.

  • We will setup our Photoshop Workspace so that everything runs nice and smoothly.

  • And the most important thing

Section 2: Selection Part 1

   We will start our journey with basic selection tools:

  • We'll first see what selection and layer mask are and how to deal with them.

  • Then we'll learn rectangular and elliptical marquee tools and what settings you need to know before using them.

  • After covering every kind of tools, you will have tasks to complete.

  • You can share your work with other students in the comments section or you can also share with me personally.

  • You'll learn how and when to use the Lasso, Polygonal Lasso, and Magnetic lasso tool.

  • Then we'll see beginners favourite Quick Selection and Object Selection tool.

  • You'll learn Magic Wand Tool which is one of the oldest selection tools in Photoshop.

    And with a challenging task I'll end this section.

Section 3: Selections Part 2

   This section deals with advanced selection tools and techniques.

  • We'll start with the Pen Tool and we'll see how to select objects and create shapes using it. We'll also look at the differences between various types of pen tool.

  • Then we'll move to direct and path selection tool and we'll see how they are used in sync with the Pen tool.

  • Further we'll look at some more techniques that selects based on the colour of the pixels, like Select Colour Range and Selection using channels.

In Deinen beruflichen und privaten Projekten wirst Du in Zukunft eine ganz andere Übersicht haben, was gerade geplant ist und wer an welchen Aufgaben arbeitet. Du wirst mit Freuden Deine Aufgaben dokumentieren und kommunizieren, einfach weil es in Trello so viel Spaß macht.

Egal, ob Du im Team oder alleine Deine Projekte und Aufgaben mit Trello steuerst: Es ist das ideale Tool, um die Aufgaben vernünftig zu planen und jederzeit die Planung den aktuellen Gegebenheiten anzupassen.

Ich selbst plane meine Udemy-Kurse mit Trello und weiß dadurch immer, wo ich stehe. Bei einer Planung und Realisierung über mehrere Wochen ist das sehr hilfreich, weil man sonst schnell das Gefühl dafür verliert, ob man gut oder schlecht in der Zeit liegt.

Wenn Du einmal die Tricks kennst (und ich verrate die in der Reihenfolge, wie Du sie brauchst), dann wirst Du Trello fürs Projektmanagement und Selbstmanagement nicht mehr missen wollen!
targetAudiences: Der Kurs richtet sich an alle, die effektiver arbeiten wollen.

Das Gleiche gilt natürlich auch für Projektmitarbeiter - Du kannst das Tool erst einmal nur für Dich nutzen und sehen, was es bringt.
Privatleute, die ihre täglichen Aufgaben in den Griff kriegen wollen.

Mastering the Intersection: Unveiling the Power of Public Policy & Political Economy

In an increasingly interconnected world where policy decisions can reshape economies and societies, the significance of mastering public policy and political economy cannot be overstated. A Master's course in Public Policy & Political Economy offers a unique opportunity for individuals to delve into the intricate realm of policymaking, economic dynamics, and their entwined impact on our global landscape. In this master course, we'll explore the nuances of such a program, its potential benefits, and the exciting avenues it opens for aspiring change-makers.

This course explores the intricate relationship between public policy and political economy, examining how government decisions impact economic outcomes and how economic forces influence policy formulation. Students will analyze the theoretical foundations, historical contexts, and practical applications of public policy in the realm of political economy, developing a nuanced understanding of the dynamics that shape societies and economies.

A Master's course in Public Policy & Political Economy is a transformative journey that equips individuals with the tools to shape the future of societies and economies. By understanding the intricate interplay between policy decisions and economic dynamics, graduates of this program become catalysts for positive change, influencing policy landscapes and fostering sustainable development on a global scale. Whether your aspirations lie in the realm of governance, economics, or beyond, embarking on this educational path can pave the way for a fulfilling and impactful career.

Course Objectives: By the end of the course, students should be able to:

1. Understand the fundamental concepts of public policy and political economy.

2. Analyze the interaction between government policies and economic outcomes.

3. Evaluate the role of political institutions, interest groups, and public opinion in shaping policy decisions.

4. Critically assess the impact of globalization and international relations on domestic policy choices.

5. Apply economic theories to real-world policy issues and dilemmas.

6. Develop skills in policy analysis, formulation, and recommendation.

7. Engage in informed discussions on current political and economic challenges.

In this master course, I would like to teach the 5 major topics:

courseDetails.title: Curso Ultimate Academic Writing: ¡Investigación + Redacción
courseDetails.shortDescription: ¡Su curso de escritura académica esencial con ejemplos de investigación y consejos prácticos de redacción de ensayos!
courseDetails.longDescription:
** El audio del video esta doblado del ingles al español **

** ¡Acceso instantáneo a las diapositivas en español e inglés! **

Este curso está especialmente desarrollado para estudiantes que necesitan los conocimientos esenciales para prepararlos para escribir y defender su tesis/disertación de manera eficiente y eficaz. ¡He creado 17 conferencias que cubren todas las facetas de la escritura de tesis en una hora y media!

Resumen

Comenzaré con el final en mente; ¿Cómo se evalúa su tesis? Basado en esta pregunta central, explico mi fórmula del éxito y lo llevo de la mano desde la selección del tema hasta la defensa exitosa de la tesis. Explicaré paso a paso los procedimientos para manejar ciertas fases de su proyecto de investigación y proporcionaré muchos ejemplos prácticos. En promedio, cada conferencia dura unos cinco minutos.

Después de completar este curso, tendrá los conocimientos esenciales para completar con éxito su proyecto de investigación, porque conoce los ingredientes necesarios. Este conocimiento es invaluable cuando está escribiendo un artículo académico, una tesis de MBA, una tesis de doctorado o una disertación.

¿Quién debe inscribirse?

- Estudiantes en prácticas
- Estudiantes de licenciatura
- Estudiantes de maestría
- Estudiantes de MBA
- Estudiantes de doctorado / disertación / doctorado

¿Qué aprenderás con este curso?

En aproximadamente una hora sabrá cómo trabajar en su tesis desde la preparación hasta la defensa exitosa. Aprenderás:

  • cómo su supervisor evaluará su investigación;

  • mi fórmula del éxito;

  • qué hace un buen tema (con un ejemplo práctico);

  • cómo se divide su esfuerzo por fase de investigación;

  • cómo presentar los resultados de su tesis;

  • un procedimiento de tres pasos para el manejo de preguntas difíciles durante la defensa de la tesis.

Estoy completamente convencido de los beneficios, pero no veo por qué debería aprender todo esto de usted.

This comprehensive course covers a wide array of advanced techniques that participants can use to discover and exploit vulnerabilities in AD systems, gaining invaluable insights into securing AD infrastructures effectively.

  1. Reconnaissance: Learn advanced reconnaissance techniques to gather critical information about Active Directory infrastructures, including domain controllers, users, groups, and trusts. Understand how to map out the AD environment to identify potential attack surfaces and weaknesses.

  5. Hacking Active Directory Certificate Services: Explore techniques to exploit Certificate Services in AD environments, bypassing security mechanisms and gaining unauthorized access.

  6. MSSQL Servers Exploitation: Learn how to identify and exploit misconfigurations and vulnerabilities in MSSQL servers integrated with Active Directory, potentially leading to privilege escalation and data exfiltration.

  7. User ACL Exploits in Active Directory: Delve into Active Directory's Access Control Lists (ACLs) and understand how to manipulate permissions to gain unauthorized access and escalate privileges.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Bienvenido al Curso - Aprende Go: La guía completa para dominar Golang


En este curso completo de "Aprende Go: La guía completa para dominar Golang", te sumergirás en el fascinante mundo de Go y aprenderás todos los aspectos clave para convertirte en un experto en este lenguaje de programación de alto rendimiento. Desde los fundamentos básicos hasta las técnicas avanzadas, este curso te brindará los conocimientos y las habilidades necesarias para desarrollar aplicaciones eficientes y escalables con Go. A través de explicaciones claras, ejemplos prácticos y proyectos desafiantes, adquirirás una comprensión profunda de la sintaxis, las estructuras de datos, la concurrencia y las mejores prácticas de Go. ¡Prepárate para convertirte en un programador competente y aprovechar todo el potencial de Go en tus proyectos!


¿Porque aprender lenguaje de programación Go?

  1. Eficiencia y rendimiento: Go fue diseñado con un enfoque en la eficiencia y el rendimiento. Es conocido por su rápida ejecución y bajo consumo de recursos, lo que lo hace ideal para aplicaciones que requieren alta velocidad y eficiencia, como servicios web, servidores y sistemas distribuidos.

  2. Simplicidad y legibilidad: Go tiene una sintaxis limpia y concisa que facilita la lectura y escritura de código. Su diseño busca minimizar la complejidad y favorecer la claridad, lo que resulta en un código más legible y mantenible.

  3. Concurrency: Go tiene soporte nativo para la concurrencia, lo que permite escribir programas concurrentes y paralelos de manera sencilla. Esto es especialmente útil en aplicaciones que necesitan manejar múltiples tareas simultáneamente, como servidores web o sistemas distribuidos.

  4. Amplia biblioteca estándar: Go cuenta con una biblioteca estándar extensa y poderosa que cubre una amplia gama de funcionalidades, desde redes y criptografía hasta manipulación de archivos y análisis de datos. Esto facilita el desarrollo de aplicaciones completas sin necesidad de depender en exceso de bibliotecas de terceros.

  5. Comunidad activa y creciente: Go cuenta con una comunidad de desarrolladores activa y en crecimiento, lo que significa que hay una abundancia de recursos, tutoriales, documentación y herramientas disponibles. Esto facilita el aprendizaje y brinda un respaldo sólido para cualquier proyecto en Go.

  6. Escalabilidad y despliegue en la nube: Go ha demostrado ser escalable y eficiente en entornos de alto rendimiento y en la nube. Es utilizado por empresas líderes como Google, Dropbox y Docker para construir aplicaciones y servicios que manejan cargas de trabajo intensivas y escalan de manera confiable.

¿Qué aprenderás en este curso?

  • Conocerás los fundamentos del Lenguaje

  • Conocerás que paradigmas soporta el lenguaje

  • Implementaras la concurrencia y los canales

  • Aprenderás Testing con Go

Temario del curso 

En las siguientes listas se muestra todo el teario del curso:

  1. Primeros pasos con Go

  2. Usu de variables y datos

  3. Control de flujos

  4. Estructura de datos

  5. Control de errores

  6. POO e Interfaces

  7. Concurrencia

  8. Funciones avanzadas

  9. Genericos en go

  10. Aplicación web sencilla

Welcome to the "Building Your Own Decentralized Application (DApp): A Step-by-Step Guide" course! In this comprehensive course, you will learn how to design, develop, and deploy your very own decentralized application (DApp) on a blockchain platform.

DApps have a wide range of applications across various industries, including finance, supply chain management, gaming, social media, decentralized finance (DeFi), and more. They enable new business models and opportunities by removing intermediaries, reducing costs, and empowering users with control over their data and assets.

Developing a DApp involves a combination of frontend and backend development. The frontend is responsible for creating the user interface and interacting with the blockchain through specialized libraries like Web3.js. The backend consists of smart contract development, which involves writing code to define the application's logic and behavior on the blockchain.

As DApps continue to evolve, scalability and usability challenges are being addressed through solutions like layer 2 protocols, sidechains, and improved user experience designs. The future of DApps holds potential for increased adoption, interoperability between different blockchains, and integration with emerging technologies like artificial intelligence and the Internet of Things (IoT).

The course is designed for developers, entrepreneurs, and enthusiasts who are interested in building decentralized applications and leveraging the power of blockchain technology. No prior knowledge of blockchain or programming is required, but a basic understanding of web development concepts will be helpful.

By the end of this course, you will have gained the knowledge and practical skills necessary to build and deploy your own decentralized application. Join us on this exciting journey to unlock the potential of blockchain technology and revolutionize the way applications are built and operated!

courseDetails.title: The Complete Biology Respiration in Plants |  Glycolysis
courseDetails.shortDescription: Glycolysis Pathway for ATP production. Enzymes Involved during the process.
courseDetails.longDescription:
The NEW course with everything you need to know about Respiration in Plants | Glycolysis and learn deep understanding of Glycolysis is the process in which glucose is broken down to produce energy. It produces two molecules of pyruvate, ATP, NADH and water. The process takes place in the cytoplasm of a cell and does not require oxygen. It occurs in both aerobic and anaerobic organisms.

Glycolysis has ten steps, and depending on your interests—and the classes you’re taking—you may want to know the details of all of them. However, you may also be looking for a greatest hits version of glycolysis, something that highlights the key steps and principles without tracing the fate of every single atom. Let’s start with a simplified version of the pathway that does just that.

In organisms that perform cellular respiration, glycolysis is the first stage of this process. However, glycolysis doesn’t require oxygen, and many anaerobic organisms—organisms that do not use oxygen—also have this pathway.

Suppose that we gave one molecule of glucose to you and one molecule of glucose to Lactobacillus acidophilus—the friendly bacterium that turns milk into yogurt. What would you and the bacterium do with your respective glucose molecules?

Glycolysis has ten steps, and depending on your interests—and the classes you’re taking—you may want to know the details of all of them. However, you may also be looking for a greatest hits version of glycolysis, something that highlights the key steps and principles without tracing the fate of every single atom. Let’s start with a simplified version of the pathway that does just that.
targetAudiences: Biology enthusiast.
Beginners in Biology.
Those preparing for board and competitive exams State Board, CBSE, ICSE , IGCSE, MHT-CET & NEET
NET & NEET Aspirants

  • Autonomia e resolução de problemas: Aprender a usar o Chat GPT pode desenvolver a autonomia e a capacidade de resolver problemas de forma independente.

  • Preparação para o futuro: A inteligência artificial e as tecnologias relacionadas estão se tornando cada vez mais presentes em nossas vidas. Aprender a usar o Chat GPT ajuda a familiarizar-se com essas tecnologias e a entender suas capacidades e limitações.

Durante o curso, você descobrirá como interagir com o modelo de linguagem do Chat GPT, fornecendo perguntas ou textos de entrada e recebendo respostas geradas automaticamente. Vamos explorar diferentes estratégias para obter as melhores respostas para atender às suas necessidades específicas.

Ao longo das aulas, você terá acesso a exemplos reais e exercícios práticos para consolidar o aprendizado.

courseDetails.title: JavaScript MasterClass
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master the Fundamentals
courseDetails.longDescription:
This JavaScript Fundamentals course is designed to provide you with a solid foundation in JavaScript programming. Whether you're a beginner or have some prior experience, this course will take you through the fundamental concepts and techniques of JavaScript programming.

The course begins with an introduction to the structure of JavaScript code, teaching you how to write clean and organized code that is easy to read and maintain. You will learn about variables and how to declare and assign values to them. We will also cover the importance of using strict mode and how it helps in writing more reliable code.

Next, we dive into the world of data types in JavaScript. You will learn about primitive data types such as strings, numbers, booleans, and the special value "null" and "undefined." We will explore how to work with these data types, perform operations on them, and understand type conversions.

Interaction is a crucial aspect of JavaScript programming, and in this course, we will cover various methods to interact with the user. You will learn how to prompt the user for input, display messages, and handle user interactions through events.

Conditional statements are essential in programming, and JavaScript offers powerful conditional constructs. We will explore if-else statements, allowing you to make decisions based on certain conditions. Additionally, we will cover switch statements, which provide an elegant way to handle multiple possible outcomes.

Functions are the building blocks of JavaScript applications, and in this course, we will dive deep into this topic. You will learn how to define and call functions, pass arguments, and return values. We will also cover function expressions and arrow functions.

By the end of this course, you will have a strong understanding of JavaScript fundamentals. You will be able to write well-structured code, declare and manipulate variables, use conditional statements effectively, and create reusable functions. Whether you're interested in web development, game development, or any other JavaScript-based project, this course will provide you with the necessary skills to get started.
targetAudiences: Anyone interested in JavaScript

courseDetails.title: Introduction to R for Environmental Data Analysis
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn to visualize average annual temperature data through graphs created by ggplot2 in R!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Interested in climate change, programming, or data visualization? Then, this course is for you!

In this course, you will learn how to graph climate data using the R programming language in Google Colab! Specifically, we'll be looking at how the average annual air temperature changes as the years go by (the x-axis will be the year, and the y-axis will be the average annual temperature). We'll use San Diego climate data from the National Centers for the Environmental Information (NCEI) Global Summary of the Year weather database, but you're welcome to use data from any city. To approximate missing values in the dataset, we'll use linear interpolation and install the necessary packages such as tidyverse, ggplot2, readr, and imputeTS. We'll make basic graphs with ggplot2, including features such as the axes, data points, and lines. Then, we'll make more aesthetic and visual graphs by adding layers, or geoms, with different features such as a title, axes labels, gradient color scale, locally estimated scatterplot smoother, and more! Next, we'll make the graphs with the Fahrenheit system instead of Celsius using a math equation to convert the temperature values. Finally, you'll be provided with some additional resources regarding climate change. No programming experience is needed.
targetAudiences: Programmers curious about the intersection of environmental science, coding, and data science/visualization.

Ich selbst arbeite seit über 20 Jahren im Controlling und habe für nationale und internationale Unternehmen gearbeitet. Sie sind bei mir also was das Thema Controlling und Excel betrifft in guten Händen.

Ancak en yakın sürede A1, A2, B1 ve B2 kurslarımız sizlerle buluşacak. Bu sayede, daha kapsamlı bir İngilizce öğrenme deneyimi yaşayabilirsiniz.

Kurslarımızda geniş bir konu yelpazesi sunuyoruz. İngilizce dilbilgisinden kelime dağarcığına, okuma ve dinleme becerilerinden konuşma pratiklerine kadar çeşitli alıştırmalar ve etkinliklerle İngilizce becerilerinizi geliştirebilirsiniz. Okuma alıştırmaları sayesinde İngilizce metinleri anlama becerilerinizi güçlendirebilir, dinleme aktiviteleriyle farklı aksanları daha iyi anlayabilirsiniz. Ayrıca, kelime oyunları ve kelime öğrenme teknikleriyle kelime dağarcığınızı genişletebilir, konuşma pratikleriyle güvenle İngilizce konuşabilirsiniz.

Kursumuzun öne çıkan özelliği ise entegre beceri çalışması yapmamız. Yani, dört temel dil becerisi olan reading (okuma), listening (dinleme), speaking (konuşma) ve writing (yazma) becerilerini bir arada çalıştırıyoruz. Bu şekilde, İngilizceyi bütüncül bir şekilde öğrenirken, gerçek hayatta da daha etkili bir şekilde iletişim kurabileceksiniz.

Kurslarımı hazırlarken amacım, İngilizce'nin sadece bir dil değil, aynı zamanda yeni bir dünya açan bir iletişim aracı olduğunu sizlere göstermekti. İngilizce öğrenmek, yeni insanlarla tanışmak, farklı kültürleri keşfetmek ve daha geniş bir dünya görüşüne sahip olmak demektir. Size yeni iş imkanları, yurtdışı iş alternatifleri ve mevcut işinizde daha yüksek bir maaş sunar. Yıllarca size sıkıcı gelmiş olsa da, doğru tekniklerle aslında eğlenceli bir yolculuktur.

Orta ve ileri seviyedeki öğrenciler de unuttukları bilgiler varsa tekrarlamak için kurstan faydalanabilirler. Kursumuz yaş veya meslek farkı gözetmeksizin herkesin katılımına açıktır. courseDetails.title: Predictive Analytics With Neural Networks in R
courseDetails.shortDescription: Create and train your own neural network in minutes
courseDetails.longDescription:
Neural networks are powerful predictive tools that can be used for almost any machine learning problem with very good results. If you want to break into deep learning and artificial intelligence, learning neural networks is the first crucial step.


This is why I’m inviting you to get into the fascinating world of neural networks. In this course you will develop a strong understanding of one the most utilised network, multilayer perceptron, suitable for both classification and regression problems.


The mathematics behind neural networks is particularly complex, but you don’t need to be a mathematician to take this course and fully benefit from it. Our emphasis here is on practice. You will learn how to operate multilayer perceptrons using the R program, how to build and train models and how to make predictions on new data.


All the procedures are explained live, on real life data sets. So you will advance fast and be able to apply your knowledge immediately.


This course contains three sections.


The first section is dedicated to the basic concepts related to neural networks and predictive analytics. You will find out what multilayer perceptrons are how they learn, what procedure they employ to make predictions. Also, you’ll learn the main prediction accuracy metrics for both numeric and categorical response variables.


In the second section we’ll build and train a multilayer perceptron to predict a bank customers’ default. In other words, our response is categorical in this case. After training the network, we’ll use it to measure prediction accuracy in the test set. But that’s not all. We will also try to improve our model by manipulating various parameters of the network and test our model accuracy using the k-fold cross-validation technique.


In the third section we build and train a model with a numeric response variable. More exactly, we’ll predict car prices depending on their technical features, using a multilayer perceptron, of course. After building the model we’ll measure its accuracy on the test set, try to improve it by modifying he network parameters and, finally, validate our model using the k-fold cross-validation method. So, the same steps as in the previous section, but this time for the particular case of a numeric dependent variable.


A number of practical exercises are proposed at the end of the course. By doing these exercises you’ll actually apply in practice what you have learned.


This course is your opportunity to become familiar with neural networks very fast. With my video lectures, you will find it easy to master these major neural networks and build them in R. Everything is shown live, step by step, so you can replicate any procedure at any time you need it.


So click the “Enroll” button to get instant access to your course. It will surely provide you with new priceless skills. And, who knows, it could enhance your future career.


See you inside!
targetAudiences: R programmers who want to learn data science
Students who want to learn data analysis and science in R

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the cyber security basics course, a brief introduction to Cyber security, why it is tagged as one of the most important subjects to businesses and Governments and why it is an attractive career choice should you be willing to consider it as a career. Please note this course doesn't teach you to code and is only an introductory course. 


For businesses, cyber security is imperative to routine business activities. In supply chain and operations for instance, cyberthreats have risen to the forefront of supply chain security concerns. Cyberthreats refer to vulnerabilities in IT and software systems, like malware attacks, piracy, unauthorized ERP access and unintentional or maliciously injected backdoors in the purchased, open source or proprietary software used by organizations. Supply chain security here primarily involves minimizing risks from using software developed by another organization, and securing organizational data accessed by another organization in your supply chain. Organizations cannot take for granted that the software that they use or purchase is secure. Because close collaboration is often required between businesses, suppliers and resellers, computer networks may become intertwined or sensitive data shared. This can result in a breach of one organization affecting many. Instead of attacking the target directly, a cybercriminal may attack a weaker organization in the target's supply chain and use that access to meet their goals. Many are responding to recent supply chain attacks such as the SolarWinds attacks by, for example, reducing reliance on foreign suppliers and building primarily domestic supply chains. Some companies are moving production out of foreign factories to domestic ones as well. This course can give a basic protection to devices used to access servers which have been attacked and protect the device.

Welcome, students! In the part 2 of this course,In this part, we're going to learn how to create beautiful designs from scratch using Canva, without relying on templates.


The first step in creating a beautiful design is to choose the right color palette. A well-chosen color scheme can make your design look polished and professional. To choose the right colors, consider the mood and message you want to convey. Warm colors like red, yellow, and orange can create a sense of energy and excitement, while cool colors like blue and green can create a calming effect.


Next, you'll want to choose the right fonts. The font you choose should be easy to read and match the tone of your design. Serif fonts, like Times New Roman, can convey a sense of tradition and formality, while sans-serif fonts, like Arial, are more modern and informal.


When it comes to arranging elements on your design, remember the rule of thirds. Divide your design into thirds both horizontally and vertically, and place your elements at the intersection points. This creates a sense of balance and visual interest.


Don't be afraid to experiment with different shapes and textures to add depth to your design. You can use shapes to create a sense of flow and movement, and textures to create a tactile feel.


Finally, pay attention to the details. Make sure your design is free of spelling and grammar errors, and that everything is aligned and consistent. These small details can make a big difference in how professional and polished your design looks.


Remember, creating a beautiful design from scratch takes practice and patience. Keep experimenting and trying new things, and soon you'll be creating stunning designs with ease.
targetAudiences: All levels with basic knowledge of canva

courseDetails.title: SQL with PHP
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn SQL with PHP
courseDetails.longDescription:
What is SQL?

Structured Query Language (SQL) is a standardized programming language that is used to manage relational databases and perform various operations on the data in them. Initially created in the 1970s, SQL is regularly used not only by database administrators but also by developers writing data integration scripts and data analysts looking to set up and run analytical queries.


The term SQL is pronounced ess-Kew-ell or sequel.

SQL is used for the following:

  • modifying database table and index structures;

  • adding, updating, and deleting rows of data; and

  • retrieving subsets of information from within relational database management systems (RDBMSes) -- this information can be used for transaction processing, analytics applications, and other applications that require communicating with a relational database.

SQL queries and other operations take the form of commands written as statements and are aggregated into programs that enable users to add, modify or retrieve data from database tables.

A table is the most basic unit of a database and consists of rows and columns of data. A single table holds records, and each record is stored in a row on the table. Tables are the most used type of database objects or structures that hold or reference data in a relational database. Other types of database objects include the following:

  • Views are logical representations of data assembled from one or more database tables.

  • Indexes are lookup tables that help speed up database lookup functions.

  • Reports consist of data retrieved from one or more tables, usually a subset of that data that is selected based on search criteria.

Each column in a table corresponds to a category of data -- for example, customer name or address -- while each row contains a data value for the intersecting column.

Relational databases are relational because they are composed of tables that relate to each other. For example, a SQL database used for customer service can have one table for customer names and addresses and other tables that hold information about specific purchases, product codes, and customer contacts. A table used to track customer contacts usually uses a unique customer identifier called a key or primary key to reference the customer's record in a separate table used to store customer data, such as name and contact information.

SQL became the de facto standard programming language for relational databases after they emerged in the late 1970s and early 1980s.


In Course?

In this course, you will learn about SQL and MySQL.

You will understand how the database works and store data.

You will learn about How to create a database and its table.

And How you can store and manage data into a database using MySql.

And you will also learn how to connect your PHP with MySQL database to perform SQL Queries.
targetAudiences: Beginner Sql

This course welcomes beginners with no prior programming experience, making it accessible to individuals from various backgrounds. However, a basic level of computer literacy and familiarity with the command line interface is recommended to fully engage with the course material.

Join me on this captivating journey into the realm of CLI app development, where you will unlock the potential of Python, Langchain, and the limitless possibilities of interactive command line experiences.


Note: Participants are expected to have basic computer literacy and familiarity with the command line interface. and setting up a code editor.
targetAudiences: This course is designed for beginners.  In the course we use Python with the Langchain frame framework to create a command line interface app that is similar to using Chat GPT.

courseDetails.title: Python Quick Start Tutorial for Beginners
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn python concepts and topics in a simple, fast and practical way.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Python Quick start tutorial course. What you will learn in this course: Fundamentals of python, functions, list, tuple, set, dictionary, classes and object oriented, working with files, error handling, data visualization and basics of web application with python.

Syntax in python is simple and easy to read and understand. And by syntax we mean a set of rules that define how to write a correct Python program. It includes rules for naming variables, using punctuation, formatting code, defining methods, etc. We will cover the fundamental ones in section 1.

Python supports several data types including integers, floats, strings, booleans, lists and so on. The primitive data types are covered in section 2. Python also has many built-in functions that can be used without the need to import any additional modules.

In section 3, I explain python decision flow with if, else if and else statements. I also teach you how to write for loop and while loop in python. At the end of this section, you are challenged to write your own code to program a traffic speed camera. You will find it easy and fun after watching this video.

In section 4, you will understand how to use functions and modules in Python.

The remaining of the sections is as follows:

5. List, Tuple

6. Sets, Dictionaries

7. Classes and Object Oriented

8. Files

9-11. (will be added)
targetAudiences: Students, early learners of Python in fast pace

courseDetails.title: WordPress Site Hızlandırma - Önemli Web Verileri
courseDetails.shortDescription: WordPress Site Hızlandırma sürecinde önemli olan Hosting, Tema ve Kullanılan Cache eklentileri ve ayarları.
courseDetails.longDescription:
WordPress, dünya üzerinde en çok kullanılan yazılımların başında gelmektedir. Diğer yandan; yanlış Hosting ve Tema seçimi ile birlikte Cache ve Asset Manager eklentilerinde de hata yapılması, WordPress tabanlı web sitenizin oldukça ağır yanıt vermesine sebebiyet verebilmektedir. Ağır yanıt veren bir web sitesine sahip olduğunuzda hem SEO noktasında problemlerle karşılaşacak hem de Adwords reklam maliyetleriniz artacaktır.

WordPress Site Hızlandırma kursumuz ise bu noktada Önemli Web Verilerine odaklanan, yapılan hataları optimize etmek üzerine kurgulanmış bir kurstur. Bu noktaya özel olarak eğilmemizin sebebi, kursta da belirttiğimiz gibi Önemli Web Verilerinin doğrulanmış bir sıralama faktörü olmasından kaynaklanmasıdır.

Kursumuz kapsamında ilk olarak Neden Optimizasyon Yapılmalı, Önemli Web Verileri Nedir ve Neden Önemlidir konularına değinmeye çalıştık. Yine kursumuzun temel hedefi web sitelerinizi Pagespeed odaklı değil, gerçek hız odaklı nasıl optimizasyon yapabileceğinizi sizlere anlatmaktır.

Bu misyonla birlikte Hosting'den başlayarak Tema ve Cache eklentileri noktalarında yapılan tüm hataları sizlere aktarmaya çalıştık. Örneğin, Resim Optimizasyonunu Masaüstü yazılımlarla nasıl optimize edebileceğinizi sizlere aktardık ki en çok yapılan hataların da başında bu gelmektedir. Smush, Robin Hood ve diğer resim optimizasyonu yazılımları yerine Masaüstü programları çok daha iyi sonuçlar verdiği için, kursumuzda bu yöntemi aktarmayı uygun gördük.

Kursumuzun son bölümünde ise otoritelerin kanıtları ve tecrübe aktarımlarımızı sizlere aktarmaya çalıştık. Bu noktada WPJohnny ve Authority Hacker gibi otoritelerin kurslarından faydalandık.
targetAudiences: WordPress Site Sahipleri

courseDetails.title: FastAPI Prerequisite: Pydantic, Dependency Injection, Python
courseDetails.shortDescription: Bare minimum requirements for getting started with FastAPI. Pydantic, SQLAlchemy, Async Python, Dependency Injection
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course is designed for students and developers who want to learn how to build fast and reliable web applications using the FastAPI Python framework. This course serves as a prerequisite for anyone who wants to dive deeper into the FastAPI framework.

The course covers the basic concepts of Python programming, type hinting, data validation, inheritance, dependency injection, and asynchronous programming, which are necessary for building FastAPI applications.


Throughout the course, students will complete hands-on exercises and quizzes to solidify their understanding of the concepts covered. By the end of the course, students will have a solid foundation and will be ready to dive into the more advanced features of FastAPI.


Topics Covered:

- Type Hinting

- Inheritance

- Pydantic

- Dependency Injection

- Asynchronous Programming


The course starts by introducing Type Hinting, a powerful feature of Python 3. Type Hinting enables developers to annotate function signatures and class attributes with type information, helping to catch errors early and improve code readability. Next, students will learn about Inheritance, a key concept in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP).

Students will also dive into Pydantic, a powerful data validation and serialization library that is tightly integrated with FastAPI. They will learn how to use Pydantic to validate and serialize data in their FastAPI applications, and how to take advantage of its powerful features, such as model inheritance and advanced data types.

The course also covers Dependency Injection, a design pattern that helps developers write more modular and testable code. Students will learn how to use FastAPI's built-in Dependency Injection system to manage their application's dependencies and create more maintainable code.

Finally, the course covers Asynchronous Programming, a technique that allows developers to write code that can perform multiple tasks simultaneously, improving performance and scalability.
targetAudiences: Beginners who want to get started with FastAPI

courseDetails.title: Keycloak integration with Spring Boot 3
courseDetails.shortDescription: Quick and easy integration of Keycloak with Spring Boot 3
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course presents a quick and easy way to integrate Keycloak with Spring Boot 3. After completing this course, you will be able to:

  • download, install and configure Keycloak

  • create a Spring Boot 3 App from scratch

  • integrate Keycloak with Spring Boot 3


Bear in mind that this course presents a simple way to get started and it doesn't represent a supreme example. All the configurations and code parts serve as a simple example that will help you understand the general idea of Authentication and Authorization through Keycloak.


The course presents important parts when it comes to configuration and integration of Keycloak with Spring Boot 3. At code level, I talk in more detail only about very important parts that may be hard to understand at first. The Java code is available to you for free, as I shared my public repository that contains everything that I present to you.


IMPORTANT! There are many things that can be improved. When it comes to securing a Spring Boot App there are many mechanisms that happen behind the scenes. In order to use them in your favor it's good for you to be aware of them and to also understand them. I do not talk about these mechanisms in this tutorial.


I hope from the bottom of my heart that this course will help you!
targetAudiences: Java developers interested in integrating Keycloak as an IAM solution in their Spring Boot 3 App

courseDetails.title: Music Production with FL Studio
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn creating music with FL Studio
courseDetails.longDescription:
Learning music composition can be a rewarding experience, especially with the right tools and guidance. With FL Studio, you will have access to powerful music production software that can help you bring your musical ideas to life. In this course, we will explore the basics of music theory, including notes, chords, chord progressions, melodies, and beats, which are essential for creating music that sounds good.

It's important to remember that creating music is an art form that requires practice and patience. You may not produce a masterpiece on your first attempt, but that doesn't mean you should give up. Instead, embrace failure as a learning opportunity and keep experimenting until you achieve the desired results.

Throughout this course, we will work together to create music that we are proud of. By sharing our progress and offering feedback, we can learn from each other and improve our skills. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced musician, this course is designed to help you develop a solid foundation in music composition and unleash your creativity with FL Studio. So, let's get started and make some amazing music together!

Here are some basics that we will do

  1. Familiarize yourself with the interface and features of FL Studio.

  2. Practice creating simple beats and melodies using different instruments and effects.

  3. Learn the basics of music theory, such as scales and chords, to create more complex compositions.

  4. Seek feedback from others to receive constructive criticism and improve your skills.

  5. Enjoy the creative possibilities of FL Studio and have fun expressing yourself through your art.

So, let's start FL Studio and Music Production Journey together.
targetAudiences: Anyone who is interested in music an creating their own songs or melodies

courseDetails.title: The Basics of Linux Command Line 2.0

courseDetails.longDescription:
Today we are used to managing our PCs by mouse clicking and nice GUI (graphical user interface). But it’s not the Linux way! Here, the default way to maintain everything is by writing text commands in the Terminal. And after this course, you’ll be proving to others that it is really a handy way.

This course gathered together the most widely used commands to quickly start using Linux. So, forget about long-long boring education. If you value your own time, then here you will find densely concentrated knowledge you really need to get handy with this operating system.

The course is based on Linux Ubuntu, but any other popular distribution that you have will work the same good.

Here you will find secret tips and tricks to do regular tasks way faster. You will get to know all the needed commands to work with files and folders. You will master working with file viewers and the most popular text editors. And learn to use search really efficiently. If you forgot some command, you need or don’t know which one to use for some specific task, in this course we discuss the ways to find required tools and their manual (the brief and full ones).

Target audience: every person interested in starting using Linux. Not for experienced Linux admins =)

So, go for it!

Graduates or workers
Software developers and other IT guys
Anyone interested in Linux

courseDetails.title: Create Brochure, Flyer and Social Post in Photoshop
courseDetails.shortDescription: Creete Brochure, Flyer and Social Post in Photoshop step by step
courseDetails.longDescription:
In today's digital age, social media has become an integral part of our daily lives. From personal social interactions to professional networking, social media has revolutionized the way we communicate and connect with one another. For businesses, social media has become a powerful tool for reaching out to their audience, promoting their products or services, and building their brand identity. However, in order to stand out from the crowd and make a lasting impression, it is crucial to create visually appealing social media posts that capture the attention of your target audience.

Similarly, brochures and flyers are also important marketing tools that help businesses to promote their products or services, provide information to potential customers, and communicate their brand identity. Whether it's a brochure for a real estate agency or a flyer for a music festival, a well-designed and informative document can make all the difference in attracting and engaging customers.

This is where Adobe Photoshop comes in. As the industry-standard software for graphic design, Photoshop offers a range of powerful tools and features that allow designers to create stunning visual content for social media, brochures, and flyers. However, for those who are new to Photoshop, it can be daunting to know where to start.

This course is designed to teach you the fundamentals of creating professional-looking social media posts, brochures, and flyers using Adobe Photoshop. Whether you're a business owner, a social media manager, or a graphic designer, this course will give you the tools and techniques you need to create eye-catching designs that communicate your message effectively.

In this course, you will learn the following:

  1. Understanding the basics of Adobe Photoshop

  2. Understanding the difference between social media posts, brochures, and flyer

  3. Design principles and elements

  4. Color theory and Typography

  5. Best practices for creating visually appealing designs

  6. Tips and tricks for saving time and staying organized

  7. How to create templates for future use

  8. Techniques for exporting and saving your designs for different platforms

By the end of this course, you will have a strong foundation in designing social media posts, brochures, and flyers in Photoshop, which will help you to create engaging and professional-looking designs for your business or personal brand.

Please leave ratings and feedback so I can bring more courses like this to you
targetAudiences: Beginners who want to learn Photoshop
Beginners who want to learn Brochure, Flyer and Social Media Post Design in Photoshop

courseDetails.title: ANGULAR - BEYOND FUNDAMENTALS - PART II
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn all you need to know to build an application using Angular
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bootstrap is a popular front-end development framework that plays a significant role in modern web development, and its importance is equally apparent when used in Angular applications. Integrating Bootstrap into Angular applications offers several advantages:

  1. Responsive Design: Ensures optimal viewing across various devices.

  2. Consistency and Speed: Pre-built components save time and maintain a uniform appearance.

  3. Customizable: Tailor the framework to create unique designs.

  4. Cross-Browser Compatibility: Functions consistently across different browsing environments.

  5. Streamlined Development: Focus on application logic rather than design and layout.


The components that you will be using throughout this course have been created in the ANGULAR - BEYOND FUNDAMENTALS - PART I course which you can check in my profile. In this part, you will design the same components using Bootstrap v5.3+.

You will learn how to:

  • Creating visually appealing Angular components using Bootstrap v5.3+ for responsive designs

  • Enhancing Angular components with Bootstrap icons for intuitive user interfaces

  • Leveraging existing Bootstrap components to develop innovative and functional designs

  • Implementing best practices for maintainable and scalable Angular applications with Bootstrap integration


This is Part 2 of the course, so to get the most out of it would be best to watch the first part of the course. By completing both parts, you'll gain a well-rounded understanding of Angular and Bootstrap integration, equipping you with the necessary skills to develop feature-rich, visually appealing web applications.

Embrace the opportunity to learn from real-world examples, and take your web development expertise to new heights. Join us on this exciting journey and transform your Angular projects into highly-responsive and user-friendly experiences.
targetAudiences: Developers eager to master a JavaScript framework by constructing a full-fledged app from the ground up
